name: abort-pdu
description: Represents a BACnet Abort PDU, used to indicate that a transaction is being aborted and to provide the reason.

fields.name: pdu-type
fields.description: Identifies the type of the PDU, which shall be always 7.

fields.name: reserved
fields.description: Reserved for future use; shall be set to zero.

fields.name: server
fields.description: Indicates whether the abort was initiated by the server (true) or client (false).

fields.name: original-invoke-id
fields.description: The invoke ID of the original request being aborted.

fields.name: abort-reason
fields.description: Specifies the reason for aborting the transaction.
